Label: ADSL core variables are carried through all ADaM Datasets. See Core Variable column on the ADSL specs for variables kept on all ADaM datasets
Analysis Sequence Number
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: After sorting dataset by the KEYS, set to 1 for the first record per subject, then incremented by 1 for each subsequent record.

Label: Analysis Date
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to numeric version of date part of VS.VSDTC. No imputation.

Label: Analysis Time
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to numeric version of time part of VS.VSDTC. No imputation.

Label: Analysis Relative Day
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to ADT-TRTSDT+1 if ADT >= TRTSDT and both date variables are non-missing,
else set to ADT-TRTSDT if ADT < TRTSDT and both date variables are non-missing.
Null if ADSL.TRTSDT is null.

Label: Analysis Visit
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: For records copied directly from VS domain, set to VS.VISIT in proper-case.

Label: Analysis Visit (N)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: For records copied directly from VS domain, set to VS.VISITNUM

Label: Parameter
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to VS.VSTEST with VS.VSSTRESU  concatenated and enclosed in parentheses. If VS.VSSTRESU is missing then populate with standard unit for the parameter.

Label: Parameter (N)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assigned based on PARAMCD, as per the codelist

Label: Baseline Record Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to 'Y' on last record with non-missing AVAL per USUBJID PARAMCD where (ADT=TRTSDT and ADT not missing and ATM<TRTSTM and ATM not = missing) or
(ADT=TRTSDT and ADT not missing and ATM is missing and ATPT = 'Pre-dose') or
(ADT<TRTSDT and ADT not missing) when sorting by USUBJID PARAMCD ADT ATM.

Label: Post-Baseline Record Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to 'Y' on all records with non-missing AVAL per USUBJID PARAMCD where (ADT=TRTSDT and ADT not missing and ATM>=TRTSTM and TRTSTM not = missing) or
(ADT=TRTSDT and ADT not missing and ATM is missing and ATPT contains 'Post') or
(ADT>TRTSDT and TRTSDT not missing).

Label: Baseline Value
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to AVAL where ABLFL='Y' per USUBJID PARAMCD.

Label: Percent Change from Baseline
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to (CHG/BASE)*100 where PSBLFL='Y' if BASE is not missing and non-zero.

Label: Analysis Criterion 1
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: If VS.VSCLSIG = 'Y' then set to 'Clinically Significant'

Label: Analysis Flag 01 (Scheduled Visits)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to 'Y' on last record per USUBJID PARAMCD AVISITN ATPT where PSBLFL='Y' and AVAL not missing when sorting by USUBJID PARAMCD AVISITN ATPT ADT ATM VSSEQ.
Null if it's unscheduled visit.
